description: "A map documenting the effects of the Krakatoa volcanic eruption, detailing the destruction of part of the Krakatoa Island and damage to surrounding areas. Created by a ship’s captain who passed through the Sunda Strait five days after the eruption."
title: "New chart of Sunda Straits, traced by Captain Morris, commander of the Queensland Royal Mail steamer 'Chyebassa' on his passage through the Straits on the 2nd Sept. 1883 [cartographic material]."
